comments.body: Running this in check mode will always result in a change even when an update is not needed. You need to do check the existing object to see if it needs updating before you exit here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +395,399 @@            self.log("Need to Create / Update the Key Vault instance")

            if self.check_mode:
                self.results['changed'] = True
                return self.results
